intent: greetings: general user greeting message like hi, hello etc.
search: The user is trying to search something related to items in a funrniture store
noreply: The user is asking something that does not fit the above two categories
moreOf: The user wants to see more of the suggested products from earlier
designer: example is -> I have this, what do I pair it with
url: When a user gives a url of a product from https://www.woodenstreet.com/product and asks for details, more like etc. If just a product url is provided with no context, still match it with url
